title: This Week On The TC Gadgets Podcast: Apple iMacs, Track Pad, Eepsters!
text: Why you should hear Kelela's Hallucinogen this week – video review 03:50 Two years on from Kelela’s acclaimed debut Cut 4 Me, a six-track EP (or mini-album) called Hallucinogen shows the Los Angeles vocalist is still finding gold in the weird area between R&B and experimental electronica, says Alexis Petridis.
